org.marinemc.settings

Class JSONConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.marinemc.settings.JSONConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerFile

    public class JSONConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    JSON Config Class

    Used for all internal and external configuration files used by MarineStandalone and its plugins. Feel free to use this for all your plugin needs.
